description: Pulling a cozy sweatshirt on after a surf session is a rite of passage on the coast, and this midweight hoody lives up to its name, with a soft blend of recycled polyester and cotton. The Marmot Coastal Hoody is just as happy lounging fireside high above your favorite coastal beaches or relaxing on a Sunday far from your go-to surf break. This classic kangaroo-pocket hooded sweatshirt is perfect for the most classic everyday uses from the neighborhood to faraway trails: dog walks, coffee runs, campfires, bike rides... The list goes on. Whether you're a sweatsuit sunrise chaser, jean jacket over hoody sunset gazer, or stuck inside all day work from homer, you'll be happy with this hoody on your shoulders.
name: Marmot Coastal Hoody - Mens
